name: Space Lander (JSBgames)
description:
Works better with a controller. If you use an xbox/ps4 controller, the controls are A(xbox) or X(ps4) to thrust upwards, and the left stick to turn left/right. Keyboard controls are space to thrust upwards and arrow keys or A and D to turn left/right.

This is a game that I have been working on and off for a while, but I am going to switch to a new project now. Please say whether you think this is a cool concept or not. Constructive criticism is appreciated.

-JSBgames
